trans-unit.source: Which virtual machine size do you need?
Which virtual machine image do you want to use?
Set the default credentials for all virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 请记录此密码。不会再次显示此密码。
名称仅可包含 250 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Name has to include at least one non-whitespace character.
trans-unit.target: 名称必须至少包含一个非空格字符。

trans-unit.source: Lab already exists, try another name
trans-unit.target: 此实验室已存在，请尝试其他名称
欢迎使用 Azure 实验室服务

trans-unit.source: Your lab account is missing or inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 你的实验室帐户缺失或无法访问。

trans-unit.source: This is a quick setup you can change your settings later.
trans-unit.target: 这是快速设置，你可以稍后更改设置。

trans-unit.source: Your lab is missing or inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 你的实验室缺失或无法访问。

trans-unit.source: An unknown error was thrown while contacting the server.
trans-unit.target: 联系服务器时引发未知错误。

trans-unit.source: The page you have requested does not exist or is not currently available.
trans-unit.target: 你请求的页面不存在或当前不可用。

trans-unit.source: The lab and its virtual machines will be permanently deleted. Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: 实验室 及其虚拟机将被永久删除。 要继续升级吗?

trans-unit.source: Lab could not be deleted. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除实验室。请重试。

trans-unit.source: Username cannot be longer than 20 characters
trans-unit.target: 用户名不能超过 20 个字符

trans-unit.source: Commonly used passwords are not acceptable
Password must include 3 of the following: a number, uppercase character, lowercase character, and a special character
trans-unit.target: 密码必须包括以下项中的 3 项: 数字、大写字符、小写字符和特殊字符

trans-unit.source: This lab name already exists. Please use another name.
trans-unit.target: 此实验室名称已存在。请使用其他名称。

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum number of users allowed into the lab
trans-unit.target: 允许进入此实验室的用户最大数目是多少?

trans-unit.source: The number of users in this lab must be between 1 and
trans-unit.target: 此实验室的用户最大数目不能超过 5。

trans-unit.source: Lab name cannot be longer than 256 characters
trans-unit.target: 实验室名称不能超过 260 个字符

trans-unit.source: Lab name cannot contain special characters
trans-unit.target: 实验室名称包含特殊字符

trans-unit.source: You are not authorized to access this resource, or your session has expired.
trans-unit.target: 你没有获得访问此资源的权限，或会话已过期。

trans-unit.source: Password must be between 8 and 123 characters
trans-unit.target: 密码必须介于 8 到 123 个字符之间

trans-unit.source: Password must be between 6 and 72 characters
trans-unit.target: 密码必须介于 6 到 72 个字符之间
用户名不能为保留密码

trans-unit.source: To connect to your Linux virtual machine using SSH, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 SSH 连接到 Linux 虚拟机，请使用以下命令:

trans-unit.source: Registration failed. Please contact the lab owner.
trans-unit.target: 注册失败。请联系实验室所有者。

trans-unit.source: Users do not have access to this template.
trans-unit.target: 用户没有访问此模板的权限。

trans-unit.source: Each user gets an instance of this template.
trans-unit.target: 每个用户拥有此模板的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: A publicly available template can't be changed to private
trans-unit.target: 公用模板无法更改为专有模板

trans-unit.source: Provide a name and description for your template that users will see.
trans-unit.target: 为用户可查看的模板提供名称和说明。
标题不能超过 255 个字符
说明不能超过 500 个字符。

trans-unit.source: A published template can't be unpublished.
trans-unit.target: 公开发布模板后，无法将其更改为专有模板

trans-unit.source: One or more of your environments could not be loaded
trans-unit.target: 无法加载一个或多个环境

trans-unit.source: Allow users access to an instance of this template
trans-unit.target: 允许用户访问此模板的一个实例

trans-unit.source: Your lab is in a corrupted state. Contact your administrator...
trans-unit.target: 实验室处于损坏状态。联系管理员...

trans-unit.source: Your virtual machine is not yet available for use. Please check again later.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟机尚不可用。请稍后再次检查。

trans-unit.source: Username cannot be longer than 64 characters
trans-unit.target: 用户名不能超过 64 个字符

trans-unit.source: Username must be made up of letters, numbers, and symbols
trans-unit.target: 用户名必须由字母、数字和符号组成

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine in failed state. Contact your administrator.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟机处于故障状态。联系管理员。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to connect to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 尝试连接虚拟机时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: In what region do you want to create the virtual machines?
Virtual machines will be created in .
Users are added to this lab by registering via the following link and registration code:
trans-unit.target: 用户通过以下链接和注册码注册，从而添加到此实验室:

trans-unit.source: If you need to increase the limit, please send an email to azlabs-preview-quota@microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要提高此限值，请发送电子邮件到 azlabs-preview-quota@microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: For preview, the maximum users you can have in this lab is
trans-unit.target: 对于预览版，此实验室的用户最大数目是

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine is not available after publishing.
Unable to load price at this time.

trans-unit.target: 欢迎使用 Azure 实验室服务

trans-unit.source: Azure Lab Services enables you to easily run a class, set up a training lab, or host a hackathon in the cloud that your students and users can access from anywhere, any time.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Azure 实验室服务，可轻松在云中管理班级、建立培训实验室和举办黑客松， 并且可供学生和用户随时随地访问。

trans-unit.source: Are you new to Azure Lab Services?
trans-unit.target: 以前没有使用过 Azure 实验室服务?

trans-unit.source: Follow the steps below to get started.
trans-unit.target: 按照下面的步骤开始使用。

trans-unit.source: Skip this step if you have an existing subscription. If you are new to Azure, create a new account for free.
trans-unit.target: 如果已有订阅，请跳过此步骤。如果是 Azure 新用户，可免费创建一个新帐户。
免费创建 Azure 帐户

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Portal, use your Azure subscription to create a lab account which centrally manages your labs.
trans-unit.target: 在 Azure 门户中，使用 Azure 订阅创建一个实验室帐户，用于集中管理实验室。

trans-unit.source: Create a lab for your class, hackathon, and more!
trans-unit.target: 为班级创建实验室、举办黑客松等等！

trans-unit.source: Sign in to create a lab
This virtual machine will be permanently deleted. Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: 此虚拟机将被永久删除。要继续操作吗?

trans-unit.source: We are unable to load your lab details at this time.
trans-unit.target: 我们当前无法加载实验室详细信息。
实验室状态为“正在加载”

trans-unit.note: {{0}} is the given name and {{1}} is the surname

trans-unit.source: We can't find anything that belongs to you.
trans-unit.target: 我们找不到任何属于你的内容。

trans-unit.source: Did you want to create a lab?
Were you invited to a lab?
trans-unit.target: 你是否收到使用实验室的邀请?

trans-unit.source: If you were, you should have received a registration link. Go to the link to register and get access to the lab.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，你应该会收到注册链接。请转到该链接注册并获取实验室的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Your registration link will look like this:
If you want to create your own, follow the steps to get started
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建自己的实验室，请按照步骤开始操作

trans-unit.source: You first need to be part of a lab account to be able to create labs. If your work or school organization already has a lab account in Azure Lab Services, contact your admin to be added.
trans-unit.target: 首先需要加入实验室帐户才能创建实验室。如果你的工作或学校组织已拥有 Azure 实验室服务的实验室帐户，请联系管理员将你加入。

trans-unit.source: This will take a few minutes...
Template successfully created! Let's set it up.
trans-unit.target: 已成功创建模板! 设置该模板。

trans-unit.source: Username cannot end with a period (.) or contain the following characters:
trans-unit.target: 用户名不得以句点(.)结尾或不得包含以下字符:

trans-unit.source: Username cannot start with '$' or '-', contain uppercase letters or special characters:
trans-unit.target: 用户名不得以 “$” 或 “-”开头且不得包含大写字母或特殊字符:

trans-unit.note: {{0}} is the number of users registered

trans-unit.source: There was an error loading virtual machine sizes.
trans-unit.target: 加载虚拟机大小时出错。

trans-unit.source: There was an error loading regions.
There was an error loading images.
Please enter a value less than 250,000,000.
trans-unit.target: 请输入一个小于 250,000,000 的值。

trans-unit.source: Limit the number of hours a user can use a VM
trans-unit.target: 限制用户可使用 VM 的小时数

trans-unit.source: How many hours do you want to give to each user?
trans-unit.target: 你希望为每个用户分配多少个小时?

trans-unit.source: The quota in this lab must be greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 此实验室的配额必须大于零。

trans-unit.source: 2. Configure and install software on your template virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 2. 在模板虚拟机上配置并安装软件。

trans-unit.source: 3. Stop the virtual machine if you want to finish later. If it is left running, it will incur cost.
trans-unit.target: 3. 如果希望稍后完成，请停止虚拟机。如果保持虚拟机持续运行，则将产生成本。

trans-unit.source: You made unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave the wizard?
trans-unit.target: 所做更改尚未保存。确定要离开该向导吗?

trans-unit.source: Once the template is ready, we will take you through the steps to configure and publish it.
trans-unit.target: 模板准备就绪后，我们会引导你完成配置和发布的步骤。

trans-unit.source: A template virtual machine will be created from the choices you make here. Once a lab is published, each user will get a virtual machine that is a copy of the template.
trans-unit.target: 将根据此处所选的内容创建模板虚拟机。发布实验室后，每个用户都将获得 一个模板副本虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: Set up the virtual machine here so that it is configured with exactly what you want to provide to your lab users. You can continue to configure up until you publish the lab.
trans-unit.target: 请在此处设置该虚拟机，使其按你希望提供给实验室用户的样式正确进行配置。 在发布实验室之前，你可继续完善实验室配置。

trans-unit.source: Make note of the username and password. They won't be shown again.
trans-unit.target: 记下用户名和密码。它们只显示一次。

trans-unit.source: You can always increase or decrease the number of users later.
trans-unit.target: 始终可在以后增加或减少用户数。

trans-unit.source: Please refresh the page and try again.
When you publish the lab, a copy of the template will be created for each user. Users will get their machines automatically when they join the lab.
trans-unit.target: 发布实验室时，将为每个用户创建实验室副本。 用户加入实验室后将自动获取其虚拟机。
